messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 97
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/12/2004 11:47:33 AM Central Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: i have noticed a negative and judging feeling thing
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/12/2004 11:47:33 AM Central Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
i have noticed a negative and judging feeling thing
out there on this list and wonder if i am the only one
feeling this.
: ) Well, I've only noticed once or twice where just a couple of people may
have 'slipped'(one of them even aplogized and made a joke? that she forgot
which list she was posting on, I think : ). I can tell a HUGE difference in this
list and 'the discussion one'. I think people who were over there and got
into that very blunt, cut & dry, cold way of addressing people are trying very
hard to not do that here...you can tell they are trying to be more respectful,
more compassionate...which to me is a much better fit w/the whole unschooling
philosophy. I think newbies feel MUCH safer talking here!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
